{"step_by_step_thinking": "Hypogonadism, developmental delay, and loss of taste and smell are symptoms of Kallmann syndrome, which is associated with a deficiency of certain hormones that are part of the reproductive and olfactory systems. Zinc is a trace element that plays a vital role in the production of these hormones. Copper, potassium, and chromium deficiencies do not typically present with these symptoms.", "answer_choice": "B. Zn"}
